o.o
THAT'S why the GBA version had a different soundtrack! I only recently learned Dave Wise wasn't onboard to do the music for the original version of this game. Wow...
author: Martin D.

text: @Martin D. Two-year-old comment, I know, but Wise did roughly a fifth or a quarter of the SNES DKC3 soundtrack. His work mostly involved the NPCs and bonus music (he did the arrangement of SM64's Inside the Castle Walls when Wrinkly's playing her N64, for instance). It's also notable that Eveline Novakovic (Fischer at the time) composed roughly a third of the music for DKC1 (including the temple, forest, and treetop themes), so she wasn't a stranger to the series when she took the music lead in DKC3.
